screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .snibb file in Snibbetracker 1.1
screenshot.caption: SNIBB file open in Snibbetracker 1.1

description: Harry Lundström developed Snibbetracker, a simple music sequencer for Windows and macOS, that allows users to arrange musical patterns and samples in a grid-like interface. Hobbyist musicians, retro computing enthusiasts, and digital music creators working with Snibbetracker are the most likely to encounter SNIBB files. When composing, they can save their progress as a SNIBB module by pressing the control + s keys.
